statements: REVOKE SELECT ON BioinformaticsData FROM user1;
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON BioinformaticsData FROM user2;
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON BioinformaticsData FROM user3;
REVOKE SELECT ON Genes FROM user1
REVOKE INSERT ON Proteins FROM user2
REVOKE UPDATE(gene_id, sequence) ON Proteins FROM user3
REVOKE INSERT ON Gene FROM user1;
REVOKE UPDATE(name) ON Gene FROM user2;
REVOKE DELETE(sequence) ON Gene FROM user3;
REVOKE SELECT ON genes FROM public
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON transcripts FROM public
REVOKE DELETE ON mutations FROM public
REVOKE SELECT ON gene_info FROM user1
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON protein_info FROM user2
REVOKE DELETE ON mutation_info FROM user3
